items.sentence: Tom probably thought I wouldn\'t like that movie.
Tom promised us that he\'d be back in three days.
Mary reached into her purse and took out a photo.
Tom doesn\'t want anyone to know that he\'s rich.
Tom doesn\'t want to see Mary\'s face ever again.
Tom couldn\'t understand anything that Mary said.
I don\'t know what part of Australia Tom is from.
I\'m usually too tired to do anything after work.
Tom asked Mary if she could give him a ride home.
Tom wasn\'t completely happy with the settlement.
